metadata.name: In praise of defeat
metadata.description:
Mohammad, 40 years old, with Ichthiyosis which is a rare skin diseases.
He is from Qom but he has been living in a small village around Babol, northern Iran since many years ago.
He's a daily-paid worker and although he has great technical skills but he hasn't found a good job yet because of his disease.
Portrait of him and his daughter in a studio in Sari, Mazandaran Province, Northern Iran.
Photo: Khashayar Sharifaee 
2017
Sari, Iran
